p: The stability of the SARS-CoV-2 S protein is lower than that of SARS-CoV S [ 42]. The mapping of multiple S sequences of the subgenus Sarbecovirus underscores that the S2 fusion region is more conserved than the S1 subunit and that the S1 subunit is more exposed at the viral surface [ 16].
